name: Mortem (itch) (Samurai Interavtive)
description:
Pc Davies was called to the local Hospital due to a disturbance. At the Hospital every thing goes wrong, what will you do.

This is my Second game I have ever made. I am aware there are a couple bugs with the game. If you find any please comment them on the game. The main one that I can't seem to fix is that you can still pick up keys from cabinets even if they are locked/closed. Also if you have any improvement please let me know.
